Articles.Content:
![Ares.png](http://www.seasky.org/space-exploration/assets/patches/Ares.png)

This one is a little quieter of a release, unfortunately. The new 1.0.2 "fix" has rendered this craft unable to reach orbit, so i'm not providing a craft download until Squad rebalances. On a lighter note, enjoy the launcher designed for the Constellation program, specifically for putting a crewed Orion into orbit.

**Craft Info:** 350 parts, 800 tons, 6700 ms of dv.

And now, beauty shots!

![eA76B4C.png](http://i.imgur.com/eA76B4C.png)

![l38QFwI.png](http://i.imgur.com/l38QFwI.png)

![VihfO6n.png](http://i.imgur.com/VihfO6n.png)

![KTVz5wa.png](http://i.imgur.com/KTVz5wa.png)

Thanks for viewing, and leave some rep if you enjoyed!
Wow, that's a really beautiful craft man!

Dang, the fix seemed to down a few, and up a few ;/

So more or less this is a showcase then ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Great job once again!

> [...]The new 1.0.2 "fix" has rendered this craft unable to reach orbit[...]

Sad:( Have some rep, though.
